entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:39 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
